page.title: 20The Authors
page.content: This survey was carried out by the children of Peak Forest School as a local studies project. In doing the project the children have visited farms ,quarries and homes and help has been given by parents, friends and the Peak National Park Education service. The project culminated in a display of work which had both written and three dimensional presentations as well as video, tape-slide and oral contributions. The project has involved the children in all aspects of the school curriculum and has been a rewarding experience.
